main event: A luminous object was sighted in the sky over Burlington, Massachusetts on July 16, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as oval or circular in shape, with a bright glow or luminous appearance and a slightly darker center.
The object moved slowly and erratically, appearing to hover and then move off rapidly.
The object made no sound and did not leave any trails or exhaust.
The observation lasted for about 15 minutes.

The investigator requested to check records from Pease Air Force Base in New Hampshire, Wheeler Air Force Base in Massachusetts, the FAA, and the Boston Air Route Traffic Control Center to see if there were any other reports related to this incident.
sighted object: luminous, oval or circular object in the sky
